mapper.insert: insert into OUTSTAFF_PAY_YEARENDAWARD_ZB (PAY_YEAR_ID, LOGIN_NAME, USER_NAME, IDENTITY_CARD, SEX, JOB_RANK, JOB_WAGES_RANK, POST_SEQUENCE, INJURY, ANNUAL_BONUS, EMPHASIS_ZX_REWARD, SUPER_HARVEST_REWARD, YEAR_ZX_REW, YEAR_HONOUR_REW, YEAR_OTHER, ATTENDANCE_DEDUCTION, TOTAL_DUE, REMARK, THIS_BUTTON_NUMB, THIS_BUTTON_AMOUNT, ACTUAL_HAIR_SUM ) values ( #{payYearId,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{loginName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{userName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{identityCard,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{sex,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{jobRank,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{jobWagesRank,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{postSequence,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{injury,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{annualBonus,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{emphasisZxReward,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{superHarvestReward,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{yearZxRew,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{yearHonourRew,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{yearOther,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{attendanceDeduction,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{totalDue,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{remark,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{thisButtonNumb,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{thisButtonAmount,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{actualHairSum,jdbcType=DECIMAL} )
